data.name: Pieter Both Village
data.detailed_description:
Pieter Both Village is a third-person action adventure game set in a rural setting of Mauritius. Our protagonist, upon returning home one day, discovers that the villagers have been infected and seeks to understand the cause of this contamination.

MAIN FEATURES:
Explore unique and exotic settings from the island of Mauritius
Encounter unseen-before infected enemies
Compelling story line with an ever-changing environment
data.about_the_game:
Pieter Both Village is a third-person action adventure game set in a rural setting of Mauritius. Our protagonist, upon returning home one day, discovers that the villagers have been infected and seeks to understand the cause of this contamination.

MAIN FEATURES:
Explore unique and exotic settings from the island of Mauritius
Encounter unseen-before infected enemies
Compelling story line with an ever-changing environment
data.short_description: Fight your way through an infected Mauritian village. Play as a local protagonist battling his way to understand the cause of this infection set in a third person setting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage and 16 GB of memory is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game requires that you fight off infected enemies using body attacks or fire arms.
